context: During the same investigation, lateral movement to the jump server (vnevado-jump) was also detected via PSExec, however the IP address remains unknown at the moment. Later, possible ransomware activity based on a known malicious extension was observed on the device on 2024-07-04. This activity involved substantial file system changes and is indicative of mass encryption of files by ransomware.
question: What is the name of the account associated with the possible ransomware activity detected on 2024-07-04?
solution_steps: A known credential theft tool was executed by the user account with AadUserId `1d94aaf6-efe6-4e76-ad56-ffd7d1257bc1`.
There was a lateral movement to the jump server `Vnevado-jump` from the IP address `99.83.111.100` using PSExec.
Possible ransomware activity was detected on the device with changes involving the account named `dp5hn` indicating mass encryption of files by ransomware.
